long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Tired of having to log in to AI tools, engineer a perfect prompt, then copy & paste your answers into FB, Twitter, Webflow, etc?

The ChatFlash browser extension is whatâ€™s missing in ChatGPT: a new extension experience that brings AI to anywhere you work in a simple cursor â€” whether youâ€™re creating social content or responding to emails. 

No more copying and pasting! The extension will be directly linked to your neuroflash account so you can pick up right where you left.

Wondering about the use cases youâ€™ll find the browser extension helpful?
Letâ€™s guide you through a few of them:

âœï¸ Rewriting existing content?
You can easily rewrite, repurpose, or summarize content using commands like, â€œSummarize the content above in 3 bullet points.â€

ğŸ“±Creating social content?
Writing social media content can be a breeze. Open the browser extension on any platform and tell ChatFlash what to write.

â­ ï¸ Need inspiration?

.... and all in your very own tonality, brand style and voice - with ChatFlash personalities.
